anya-e0605n1:0_0: From when the villages are married girls
anya-e0605n1:2_0: One who is born and glanced in this very life, remembering and keeping what they’ve learned is a sanctuary free of peril.
anya-e0605n1:3_0: While they’ve dwelt away on that path, they lift up the stars, and meet at that foot.
